publicaciones.title_en: Physical exercise and its prescription in patients with chronic degenerative diseases.

publicaciones.title_en: The use of World Health Organization growth curves in children and adolescents that live in regions of moderate altitude.

publicaciones.title_en: Concordance of percentage of body fat tissue determined with a specific equation compared to three generic equations in school age children of moderate altitude.
